reviews.text: Port with lots of yachts in but a bit further along you will get to Port Vell which will really impress you.

We had a little stroll past here. The port was full of different yachts, didn't see any super large millionaire yachts when we walked through.

There was some lovely restaurants surrounding the port which all looked nice.

We visited here after having a day at Barcelona zoo 
fast & furious appreciation WOW !!! 
Nearly missed these by the harbour , 
all the boats were amazing with some for sale for a mere 2million 😁
right by all the shops and restaurants too.
Masnou Port is just 20 minutes by car from Barcelona. Among its facilities, it has 1081 moorings for boats up to 22 meters long, services of all kinds and nautical activities. Must visit
